example.text: Watch: in 90 seconds, I break down the debt ceiling debate you've been hearing so much about. Simply put, the House GOP is holding our nation’s credit hostage to make insane spending cuts. That's not how you negotiate a budget—& it's a disaster waiting to happen for our country [[url]]

The bottom line is that if we want to set our kids up for success, keep our country competitive and on the cutting edge, and have a truly strong workforce, we've got to work together to invest in building bright futures for our kids. [[url]]

And as this year comes to a close, I'm proud to look back and say that this was one of the most productive sessions of Congress in recent history. I mean-seriously-we did a whole lot: Lowered health care and prescription drug costs, especially for seniors Brought back American manufacturing Protected same-sex couples and marriage equality Strengthened the Postal Service Began to tackle the gun violence epidemic Cared for toxic-exposed veterans Took bold action on climate Created good-paying jobs in WA state Strengthened our public health and preparedness systems Protected pregnant and nursing workers Helped families afford child care Fought the mental health and substance use disorder crises Kickstarted a clean energy economy and brought down energy costs Reduced the deficit Confirmed Justice Jackson to the Supreme Court Funded local and community projects in WA state All this and we're just scratching the surface!
It is a political entity that will gladly push disinformation and lies if it means profits and political gain. Let's just call it what it is.

And as this year comes to a close, I'm proud to look back and say that this was one of the most productive sessions of Congress in recent history. I mean-seriously-we did a whole lot: Lowered health care and prescription drug costs, especially for seniors Brought back American manufacturing Protected same-sex couples and marriage equality Strengthened the Postal Service Began to tackle the gun violence epidemic Cared for toxic-exposed veterans Took bold action on climate Created good-paying jobs in WA state Strengthened our public health and preparedness systems Protected pregnant and nursing workers Helped families afford child care Fought the mental health and substance use disorder crises Kickstarted a clean energy economy and brought down energy costs Reduced the deficit Confirmed Justice Jackson to the Supreme Court Funded local and community projects in WA state All this and we're just scratching the surface!

It is also worth noting, if you manage a retirement plan for a faith-based organization and you want to make sure you are investing in accordance with your client's faith, that, too, would be ESG investing. When we call for divesting from foreign adversaries due to human rights and national security concerns, again, we are actually talking about ESG investing.

Making birth control available over-the-counter is just one piece of this—we also have to make sure it's fully covered by insurance. I have a bill with [[user]] to do just that, & we're going to reintroduce it next week to keep up this fight. #FreeThePill
